verbose_text: Surprisingly, however, the expression of many other BMP signaling genes (Bmpr2, Smad1, Smad2, Smad3 and Smad7) and down-stream SMAD interacting molecule genes (Sip1, Yy1, Trap and Msx1) also was low and unchanged, with reference to medium to high expression of genes encoding key beta-cell markers (PDX1 and NEUROD) and hormones (INS1, INS2, GCG, SST and PPY) (XREF_FIG A).
